pkgmetadata.longdescription: iorodeo-potentiostat---------------------Python interface to IO Rodeo's Potentiostat Shield for the teensy 3.2 development board.Example--------.. code:: python from potentiostat import Potentiostat dev = Potentiostat('/dev/ttyACM0') dev.set_curr_range('100uA') dev.set_sample_period(10) name = 'cyclic' param = { 'quietValue' : 0.0, 'quietTime' : 1000, 'amplitude' : 2.0, 'offset' : 0.0, 'period' : 1000, 'numCycles' : 5, 'shift' : 0.0, } dev.set_param(name,param) t,volt,curr = dev.run_test(name,display='pbar')Install--------.. code:: bash $ pip install iorodeo-potentiostatLinks-----* Documentation https://iorodeo.github.io/iorodeo-potentiostat-docs-build/ * Download https://github.com/iorodeo/potentiostat
